name: cloudflarednsupdater
description: Application used to update Cloud Flares DNSA entry so that traffic can be routed to this servers IP Address for processing. Used in Self Hosting on Raspberry Pi

scripts.start: node --use_strict index.js -i https://api.ipify.org -e kumaranm2040@gmail.com -k CLOUDFLARE_SILVERLANTERNSLIGHT_KEY -z CLOUDFLARE_SILVERLANTERNSLIGHT_ZONEID -d silverlanternslight.com -a CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNTID -f 30
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV='production' node index.js -i https://api.ipify.org -e kumaranm2040@gmail.com -k CLOUDFLARE_SILVERLANTERNSLIGHT_KEY -z CLOUDFLARE_SILVERLANTERNSLIGHT_ZONEID -d silverlanternslight.com -a CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNTID -f 30

author: Kumaran Moodley
